quest: Slay the ancient dragon Vrothgar, who guards the cursed hoard in the Emberfall Peaks.
Venture into the Whispering Woods to find the lost druid stone before the moon wanes.
Defeat the exiled sorcerer Altherin who rules the floating citadel with iron magic.
Hunt down the necromancer Malgros, whose undead minions plague the Weeping Vale.
Clear out the goblin-infested tunnels beneath Blackroot Hill and recover the stolen village heirloom.
